scripts.pbuildlocalOld: REACT_APP_SERVER=local tsc && vite build && cp -r build/static ../build/resources/main/static/ && cp -r build/*.* ../build/resources/main/templates/
scripts.pbuildlocal: REACT_APP_SERVER=local tsc && vite build && cp -Rf build/static ../src/main/resources/static/ && cp -Rf build/*.* ../src/main/resources/templates/
scripts.pbuilddev: REACT_APP_SERVER=dev tsc && vite build && cp -Rf build/static ../src/main/resources/static/ && cp -Rf build/*.* ../src/main/resources/templates/
scripts.pbuildprod: REACT_APP_SERVER=prod tsc && vite build && cp -Rf build/static ../src/main/resources/static/ && cp -Rf build/*.* ../src/main/resources/templates/
